message.body: I've been a slacker. How's ur weekend starting off?
Not yet started! Still working. Clocked up 75 hours this week. I'm half asleep already! How about yourself?
Just finished up DJing a pool party. Nothing planned after.
Are you into movies? Man of Steel is on!
I enjoy movies occasionally but I have never been into superhero flicks
I think there is one movie out there I'd like to see but I dont recall the name.
I love Johnny Depp and he is starring in The Lone Ranger, but that's not usually my type of movie
I see. What kind of movies do you typically watch?
